Author: jmaresca
Title: [ANN][ICO] EvoChain Next Generation Invoicing [Rated 4.6/IcoBench 5.0/TrackICO]
Body: Hello fullspeedin and thanks for your post. Its always good to be cautious especially in the world of crypto and ICO's however we have never claimed to have any partnership with VISA. The way we are doing it it is without formal cooperation/partnership and as part of their gift card merchant program, which does not require special cooperation or partnership. However, we have JP Morgan's former CFO/COO/CSO on our team (Brent Beeman), and he is in fact seeking such a partnership, but that's not a done deal as of this time. Either way, the service we offer does not require such a partnership with VISA, it works either way, it just wouldn't hurt to have one, which is why we are seeking one. Again thanks for your comment and if there is anything else I can answer for you please do not hesitate to ask.

Author: jmaresca
Title: [ANN][ICO] EvoChain Next Generation Invoicing [Rated 4.6/IcoBench 5.0/TrackICO]
Body: REGISTER FOR THE PRESALE HERE  Hello Bitcointalk members! My name is Joe Maresca and I am the CMO of Evochain. EvoChain is an online cryptocurrency for VISA swap platform using Ethereum blockchain technology, which solves the key obstacles inhabiting the spending of cryptocurrency today, namely avoiding payment processing issues for businesses that do not accept crypto.  EvoChain will operate on Ethereum blockchain smart contracts and will introduce a new cryptocurrency called a “ECHO”. Using Ethereum smart contract EvoChain will make inter-compatible blockchains smart invoices possible, as well as crypto swaps for VISA Debit eGift Cards for a low fee.   During the whole ICO including Pre-ICO period, the Company releases limited amount – 322.5 million of ECHO tokens into the market. Of these 322.5 million 96% will be sold out during the ICO. Price of one ECHO token is a subject to change depending on the period of buying. The number of the EvoChain ECHO Tokens allowed for purchase by one User is not limited. The ECHO will be Ethereum-based cryptographic tokens of value.   EvoChain tokens allow Users to swap cryptocurrencies on the EvoChain platform as well it can be used as an investment asset which has a potential to grow and be exchanged for a higher price at the later stage of the project.   Here are the sale dates:  Pre-Sale: April 6 to May 3 ICO Sale: June 1 to July 9  THERE IS CURRENTLY A 20% BONUS FOR THE PRESALE!!  Softcap: 1000 ETH HardCap: 75,787 ETH  Pre-Sale & ICO Bonus Weeks Presale: April 6 to April 13 - 20% Presale: April 14 to April 21 - 10% Presale: April 22 to May 3 - 5% ICO: June 1 to June 9 - 20% ICO: June 10 to June 17 - 10% ICO: June 18 to June 30 - 5%  *Unsold tokens from the previous round will be moved to the next round.  Token: ECHO Tokens for sale: 303,150,000 Pre-Sale Price: 4000 ECHO = 1 ETH Platform: ETHEREUM Softcap: 1000 HardCap: 75,787  Ratings & Reviews: ICOBench: 4.6 TrackICO: 5.0  *If interested in being a promoter feel free to PM me or email me at josephmaresca@evochain.io  **Promoters will be paid 5% of what their referrers purchase.  For example, if your referrer purchases 1000 ECHO, you will get 50 ECHO and your referrer will still get 1000 ECHO.  **PLEASE NOTE: If you are able to generate a significant amount of ECHO tokens sold I would be able to bump your referrer bounty percentage.  ***Translation bounty offered. PM me for details.  REGISTER FOR THE PRESALE HERE   Slack: https://evochain.slack.com/messages/C9PV707KN/  Github: https://github.com/futurebrain2045/ECHOsmartcontract  Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/7C3nxa6  Twitter: https://twitter.com/evo_chain  Telegram: https://t.me/evochain  EVOCHAIN BOUNTY PROGRAM  Token Distribution- $50,000 worth of ECHO tokens (rate determined at time of distribution) will be distributed to participants in the bounty. Author: jmaresca
Title: [ANN][ICO] EvoChain Next Generation Invoicing [Rated 4.6/IcoBench 5.0/TrackICO]
Body: With EvoChain, anyone can easily create and send/receive a smart invoice. This invoice is bound by a smart contract, so neither party has to worry about trust. A smart invoice generated by EvoChain can be paid in full with most cryptocurrencies, with no fee on our part. It is anonymized, encrypted, safe and there is a built-in timed refund system in the event of a mistake or worse, and payment is fast.

Author: jmaresca
Title: [ANN][ICO] EvoChain Next Generation Invoicing [Rated 4.6/IcoBench 5.0/TrackICO]
Body: Hello idioma1 and thank you for your question. Once the main sale is over we will be working our way into many of the top exchanges. In addition, we are currently working on deals with companies to power their invoicing. We are presently working on deals with some of the most popular freelancing platforms to power their invoicing.

Author: jmaresca
Title: [ANN][ICO] EvoChain Next Generation Invoicing [Rated 4.6/IcoBench 5.0/TrackICO]
Body: Thank you Peter. All we want to do is create a great project/product for our business associates and earn for our investors. We understand that the crypto world is full of scams and poor project ideas and attempts. Our goal is to create a highly profitable and long term sustainable business.
